Package com.efecte.postit.controller

Class NotesController

java.lang.Object
com.efecte.postit.controller.NotesController
@RestController @RequestMapping("note") @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:4200") public class NotesController extends Object
NotesController to handle or control the requests for a Post (Note)
